//OTB string to provide //Main data (Mandatory) This application can access information linked to your account/profiles. This application can use your name, date of birth and email in order to identify you for example. The geolocation service allows application to use mobile network, Wi-Fi and GPS information to locate you approximatively. This application can use files stored on your device or on an external storage medium. This permission allows the application to read, edit or delete stored files. This application can access, add and / or change your phone contacts. This application collects information on the use of the application and sens us such information for statistical analysis to further improve the service provided to you and the relevance of the notification messages sent by the service. Such information is collected and processed in compliance with applicable laws.
//Other data (NOT Mandatory) This application can use camera of your device. The camera access allows this application to take pictures and record videos. This application can use the calendar information on your device, including consultation of recorded events. This application can use the SMS function of your device. The application can: receive, read, edit and send SMS-MMS. This application can use micro of your device. The access to micro allows the application to record audio content. This application can access the ID of your mobile and phone number. This application can also determine if you are making a call and get the number called. This application can access data collected by your connected object which is synchronized with your device.
//Usage Data (Mandatory) The indicated age corresponds to the minimum age recommended to use this application according to presented content. This application can integrate social features. This application can redirect you to social network such as Facebook or Twitter. In this application, you can buy other contents or services. This application can broadcast advertising via advertising cookies in order to propose you products and services adapted to your real or supposed interests.
//END OTB string to provide
